pullRequest.body:
Addresses a few porting notes; I expect also a substantial speed-up of some proofs.
Change a few default values of proof fields from `continuity` to `fun_prop`; this required a few fix-ups downstream. (I checked a few instances; the failure seems related to `Continuous.subtype_mk` not always firing.)

This is almost (but not fully) exhaustive.

----------
One proof gets partially un-automated (cont. -> partial fun_prop); if desired, I can revert this change.

- [ ] depends on: #11092 

<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body:
### PR summary [9aac757c82](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/13994/commits/9aac757c82dfd9104097471ac066838e099debca)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

#### Declarations diff

No declarations were harmed in the making of this PR! üêô
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.
CI is done (except for the linter), so let's benchmark this
!bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/d5b8f35a-e777-4f0f-ac1c-4a4d3732d45e) for commit 693fb509833d0220006379036712c02a6a203301.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/406212f1-1ab7-4876-9f3d-7a6fa74518f4/to/d5b8f35a-e777-4f0f-ac1c-4a4d3732d45e) against commit 63b99cae5ea714baa36709508ebea288d715735b:
```diff
  Benchmark                                               Metric         Change
  =============================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.Topology.ContinuousFunction.StoneWeierstrass   instructions   -12.6%
+ ~Mathlib.Topology.Homotopy.HomotopyGroup                instructions   -15.8%
+ ~Mathlib.Topology.MetricSpace.Perfect                   instructions   -72.0%
```

General information: ```text build: -81.718 * 10‚Åπ (-0.0667%) ``` No file got slower by at least 10‚Åπ instructions. No file got slower by at least 10%. 5 files got faster by at least 10‚Åπ instructions: ```text Mathlib.Topology.ContinuousFunction.StoneWeierstrass: -31.429 * 10‚Åπ (-12.6%) Mathlib.Topology.MetricSpace.Perfect: -21.279 * 10‚Åπ (-72.0%) Mathlib.Topology.Homotopy.HomotopyGroup: -15.318 * 10‚Åπ (-15.8%) Mathlib.Topology.Homotopy.Path: -6.6815 * 10‚Åπ (-9.17%) Mathlib.Analysis.NormedSpace.PiTensorProduct.InjectiveSeminorm: -2.8943 * 10‚Åπ (-0.990%) ``` 3 files got faster by at least 10%: ```text Mathlib.Topology.MetricSpace.Perfect: -72.0% Mathlib.Topology.Homotopy.HomotopyGroup: -15.8% Mathlib.Topology.ContinuousFunction.StoneWeierstrass: -12.6% ```

I would like this PR to wait for #11092. I don't think we should be making `fun_prop` a default field until some of those bugs are fixed.

I have added this as a dependency to this PR, even though it isn't technically required in order to reflect this. Another maintainer can override me if they wish with an explanation.
If I find the time, I can also take out the default value changes (as the other ones are clearly good already). I'll see.

This PR/issue depends on:
* ~~leanprover-community/mathlib4#11092~~
By **[Dependent Issues](https://github.com/z0al/dependent-issues)** (ü§ñ). Happy coding!
<!-- By Dependent Issues (Action) - DO NOT REMOVE -->

The current auto-param uses `continuity`, which is slower... so, a good follow-up would be to make that use `fun_prop` as well. (This causes some breakage, which is why I'd like to not do so in this PR.)
My impression is that this version is significantly faster. That said, it would be great to reduce this to one line... perhaps mk_apply should be tagged with fun_prop?

From #14040: if you add
```suggestion
@[continuity, fun_prop]
```
then `fun_prop` can prove `continuous_*` below.
Thanks for the hint! When I tried this, I needed to call `dsimp only` also. I've pushed this so you can take a look yourself.

pullRequest.title: chore(Topology): replace continuity -> fun_prop

source.title: `continuity` tactic is not as capable as in mathlib3
